headline: VINTED 🚫🍑💦 BLOCKS 'SICKENING' PORN ADS 😱🔞 – MOMMY 👩‍👧 SPOTTED THOT WAVE 🌊🍆 VID WHILE HUNTING ROBES 🛀👗!
text:
VINTED 🛍️📱 the THRIFT QUEEN 👑🤑 got CAUGHT SLIPPIN' 😩💦 with some NAUGHTY ADS 🚫🔞 that had MUM KIRSTY HOPLEY 🧓44 from CARLISLE 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 SCREAMING 'WTF' 😱📱! This LAW & CRIMINOLOGY TEACHER 📚🔒 was just VIBIN' 👀🛀 searchin' for a CUDDLY DRESSING GOWN 🛌👘 when BAM 💥 – AUTO-PLAY PORN 🎥🍆💦 pops up showin' a GRAPHIC 'SICKENING' BANG SESSION 😈🔪🍑 next to her TEEN DAUGHTER 👧😢! 'I GOT FILTERS ON MY WIFI 🛡️🌐 but this SLUTTY SH*T snuck thru like a NINJA THOT 🥷💋!' she SPILLED to BBC 📰👀, now BOYCOTTIN' VINTED FOREVER 🚫🛒 cuz 'LOVE the DEALS 💸 but HATE the FREE SHOW 🍆📺!' 😂🤮

VINTED NO AGE GATE 🚪👶 recently ROASTED in FRANCE 🇫🇷🥖 for SELLERS LINKIN' to ADULT DUNGEONS 🔗😈 – but this AD was from DRAMAWAVE 📱🎬, droppin' SHORT-FORM ROMANCE SIMPS 🍑❤️ series like TIKTOK THIRST TRAPS 📹💦 over MULTI-EPISODE BINGES ⏳😍! VINTED MOMMY 👩‍💼 said 'ZERO TOLERANCE 🚫🍆 for UNSOLICITED SEXTING 📱💋 or SEX SELLS 🤑🔞 – we BLOCKED that SH*T FAST ⚡🛑!' Spokesperson SPILLIN' TEA ☕: 'VIOLATORS GET YEETED 🚮💨!' BBC PINGED DRAMAWAVE 📲🗣️ but they GHOSTIN' like BAD HOOKUP 👻🍆. 😂

ASA 👮‍♂️📜 the AD POLICE 🚔 dropped the HAMMER 🔨: 'ADS CAN'T HARM or OFFEND 😡🚫, ZERO TOLLY on DEGRADING WOMEN PORN 📺👩‍🍼 – REPORT that CRAP!' They BEGGIN' SIMPS to SNITCH 📞👀. Kirsty HOPIN' UK's ONLINE SAFETY ACT 🛡️📱 (OSA) would BLOCK KIDDO EXPOSURE 🚫👶🔞 but nah, only FRAUD ADS in SCOPE 💸🤥 – so MUMS gotta PLAY VIGILANTE 🦸‍♀️🔍! VINTED CLEANIN' UP its ACT 🧹✨ or this DRAMA WAVE 🌊😈 gonna CRASH harder than a BAD ONLYFANS DROP 💥🍑? MOM WINS this ROUND 🏆👩‍👧, THOTS BTFO 🚫💦 – stay SAFE scrollin', fam! 😤🛡️ #VintedPurge #PornAdFail 🤣🔥
